meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Kevin Butterfield Talia Lavin Audrey Watkins-Fox Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7128.

td.p: Kevin Butterfield, a history professor from Norman, Oklahoma
Talia Lavin, a fact checker originally from Teaneck, New Jersey
Audrey Watkins-Fox, a mortgage coordinator originally from Lockport, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $25,400)

tr.td: A STREAM OF TV
HISTORY
BREAKFAST
BYE, GEORGE!
THE WEALTH OF NATIONS
THE LAST "AND"
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those letters of the alphabet--"A-N-D".)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
